languages.text: "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума" — говорят ли тебе эти слова что-то? Может, твои способности могут подсказать?"
"Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"
languages.original_text: "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума" — говорят ли тебе эти слова что-то? Может, твои способности могут подсказать?"

traits.locale_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"
"Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"
"Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"
"Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

languages.text: «Epitafio, incidente N872-04, tecnoplaga... ¿le dicen algo estas palabras? Quizá sus aptitudes puedan proporcionarnos información al respecto».
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: «Epitafio, incidente N872-04, tecnoplaga... ¿le dicen algo estas palabras? Quizá sus aptitudes puedan proporcionarnos información al respecto».

languages.text: 「『エピタフ』、『N872-04事件』、『テック・ブライト』―これらの言葉に聞き覚えはないか？お前の能力で何かわかることは？」
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: 「『エピタフ』、『N872-04事件』、『テック・ブライト』―これらの言葉に聞き覚えはないか？お前の能力で何かわかることは？」

languages.text: “荒垄碑碣、N872-04号事故、技术枯萎病，你对这些词有印象吗？也许你的能力可以告诉你某些事情？”
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: “荒垄碑碣、N872-04号事故、技术枯萎病，你对这些词有印象吗？也许你的能力可以告诉你某些事情？”

languages.text: « Épitaphe, incident N872-04, technopeste... Ces mots signifient-ils quelque chose pour vous ? Vos aptitudes peuvent-elles vous renseigner ? »
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: « Épitaphe, incident N872-04, technopeste... Ces mots signifient-ils quelque chose pour vous ? Vos aptitudes peuvent-elles vous renseigner ? »

languages.text: "Epitaph, Vorfall N872-04, Tech-Seuche — sagen Euch diese Wörter irgendetwas? Vielleicht können Eure Fähigkeiten Euch etwas verraten?"
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: "Epitaph, Vorfall N872-04, Tech-Seuche — sagen Euch diese Wörter irgendetwas? Vielleicht können Eure Fähigkeiten Euch etwas verraten?"

languages.text: "Sinyazıt, N872-04 Sayılı Hadise, tekno afeti... Bu sözler sana bir şey ifade ediyor mu? Belki kabiliyetlerini kullanarak çözebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Epitaph, Incident N872-04, tech-blight — do these words mean anything to you? Perhaps your abilities can tell you something?"

traits.locale_text: "Kitabe, N872-04 Hadisesi, tekno afeti... Bu sözler sana bir şey ifade ediyor mu? Belki kabiliyetlerini kullanarak çözebilirsin."
